properties.areaDesc: Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 9 at 9:09AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
An upper level disturbance will bring periods of snow this morning
along the Rocky Mountain Front. Snow may be moderate to heavy at
times, and reduce visibility below 1 mile. Snow may diminish in
coverage and intensity this afternoon, then more snow showers are
possible this evening. Overall new snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches are possible. Those traveling across mountain passes should
prepare for reduced visibility and snow covered roads at times.

NWSheadline: PERIODS OF SNOW EXPECTED ALONG THE ROCKY MOUNTAIN FRONT THIS MORNING
